ComicInfo.Summary: Al Simmons is returned to his demonic birthplace where he is attacked by Billy Kincaid, after beheading him he is tormented by a legion of demons in the likeness of Wanda. When he realizes that Malebolgia has tricked him, he destroys the demons and passes another of the Malebolgia's tests. Malebolgia then agrees to leave Wanda alone in exchange for Al's loyalty and servitude. Spawn then enters Terry's dreams where he suddenly awakens knowing that Al is "alive."
